title: Out and about at last!

pars: It didn’t take much encouragement to bring out the punters for Melbourne Cup parties at our local pubs. Great food and great weather ensured the events lived up to expectations - and with the excitement of being recently ‘let out’, how could anyone not have a wonderful day!

While dining and drinking was high on the agenda of the day, it was also a novelty to get dressed up in finery once again - and of course, remembering the excuse for the partying, all tuned in to watch the Big Race.
Indeed Melbourne Cup Day 2020 lunches may well be remembered as the ‘events of the year’.

abstract:
It didn’t take much encouragement to bring out the punters
for Melbourne Cup parties at our local pubs. Great food and great
weather ensured the events lived up to expectations - and with the
excitement of being recently ‘let out’, how could anyone not have
a wonderful day!
